title: Tahm Kench Chef Skin Knife Stuck to Fork Bug

embed.description: While in game playing as Tahm Kench with his chef skin, if you taunt Tahm should normally stick his knife out. However recently while taunting he would stick out an empty hand while his knife would be stuck to the knife on his back. I posted this to submit to the riot website for bug report.

body: While in game playing as Tahm Kench{{champion:223}}  with his chef skin, if you taunt Tahm should normally stick his knife out. However recently while taunting he would stick out an empty hand while his knife would be stuck to the knife on his back.

replies.body:
Hey ButterCreature! 

Thanks for the report!  I believe this was caused by a re-export of his animations to fix clipping issues with his belt. ;-;
